articles.title: India’s WPL aims to be a game-changer for women’s cricket
articles.description: The newly launched Women’s Premier League is aiming to become the leading competition in women’s cricket.
articles.content:
The inaugural season of the Womens Premier League (WPL) got under way in Mumbai on Saturday, and while the season may just be 22 days long, it could put womens cricket on a very different path.
Its … [+5864 chars]

articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
